publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2808 Brian Adam:NUJ Freelance Day of Action 7 June 2005—That the Parliament commends the NUJ for the proactive way it is promoting the work of its freelance members through a day of action on 7 June 2005 and recognises the importance of NUJ freelance contributors to a high quality, diverse and free press in Scotland.

S2M-2808 Brian Adam:NUJ Freelance Day of Action 7 June 2005—That the Parliament commends the NUJ for the proactive way it is promoting the work of its freelance members through a day of action on 7 June 2005 and recognises the importance of NUJ freelance contributors to a high quality, diverse and free press in Scotland. Supported by: Cathy Peattie*, Campbell Martin*, Jim Mather*

S2M-2808 NUJ Freelance Day of Action 7 June 2005 (lodged on 12 May 2005) Chris Ballance*, Rob Gibson*, Alex Neil*, Stewart Stevenson*, Robin Harper*, Christine Grahame* R, Shiona Baird*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-2808 NUJ Freelance Day of Action 7 June 2005 (lodged on 12 May 2005) Carolyn Leckie*, Eleanor Scott*, Nora Radcliffe*, Colin Fox*, Tommy Sheridan*, John Swinburne*, Michael Matheson*
S2M-2808 NUJ Freelance Day of Action 7 June 2005 (lodged on 12 May 2005) Ms Sandra White*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S2M-2808 NUJ Freelance Day of Action 7 June 2005 (lodged on 12 May 2005) Frances Curran*, Patrick Harvie*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*
S2M-2808 NUJ Freelance Day of Action 7 June 2005 (lodged on 12 May 2005) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-2808 NUJ Freelance Day of Action 7 June 2005 (lodged on 12 May 2005) Bill Butler*
S2M-2808 NUJ Freelance Day of Action 7 June 2005 (lodged on 12 May 2005) Robert Brown*, Nicola Sturgeon*
